name: associate_id
description: Unique identifier for the associate who processed the sale.

name: card_id
description: Unique identifier for the card used in the purchase.

name: address_id
description: Unique identifier for the address associated

name: product_id
description: Unique identifier for the product purchased.

name: inventory_id
description: Unique identifier for the inventory item.

name: location
description: Location store where the purchase was made.

name: purchase_date
description: Timestamp when the purchase was made.

name: normal_processing_time
description: Normal processing time for the purchase.

name: expedited_processing_time
description: Expedited processing time for the purchase.

name: peak_season_multiplier
description: Peak season multiplier for the purchase.

name: final_price
description: Total amount for the purchase after applying discounts.
